posts.post_content:
I don't think I've ever done the eBay link method, but this is a season where being short on time is the norm, so hopefully this suffices. 

Prices are not firm. Please contact me if there is anything you have interest in. I'm never offended or insulted by an offer, and will also quote you a price off eBay (via normal PayPal) if you'd prefer. I couldn't care less if someone offers a "lowball" offer, as I only consider it what the buyer is willing to pay. I'll respond regardless. 

Payment would be through normal PayPal. 

[URL="http://stores.ebay.com/The-Cards-of-Our-Pastime/T-Cards-Tobacco-Graded-/_i.html?_fsub=6363337015&_sid=159857865&_trksid=p4634.c0.m322"]T Cards Graded (142 Cards, 129 are T206)[/URL]

[URL="http://stores.ebay.com/The-Cards-of-Our-Pastime/T-Cards-Tobacco-Raw-/_i.html?_fsub=6457034015&_sid=159857865&_trksid=p4634.c0.m322"]T Cards Raw (240 Cards, 237 are T206)[/URL]



Contact me at [url]the.cards.of.our.pastime@gmail.com[/url]


.
